review: I love connecting this to my TV, and watch tv series on netflix with just some taps on my phone, it's easier than connecting through HDMI from a computer.It's cool to watch youtube videos, netflix and any other video if you mirror through the chrome browser on your computer.You can play any movie you have on your computer. Just left-click on the movie, select the file "open as default in", and select chrome. The movie will open up in chrome browser and you can mirror that with the chromecast app for chrome.It literally takes 10 minutes tops to install the chromecast. I love to take it with me while I'm traveling.

review: Design and flexibility are great.  Reason I did not give 5 stars is that some apps are pixelating at times whereas other streaming devices and apps I use like Roku, slingbox, Netflix, Amazon Video maintain cleaner picture.  I'm going to double check my wireless network to be sure, but initial tests make me think it is the Chromecast.  But, for $35, I would buy it again.
author: Tony Jerig

review: It's a chromecast!  Plug it in, connect it to your network, away you go.  I couldn't get the installer and original setup to work from my laptop, but it worked fine from my phone.  I'm betting on my system not requesting a new IP when it tries to connect to the chromecast's wifi setup system.  Either way, it works great and they're pretty cheap.
